title: Reverse 4 You
overview: Jattawa, a 19-year-old girl with the power to stop and rewind time for ten minutes each day, meets her soulmate Four, a fierce fourth-year university student, for the first time on a strange day when it snows in Thailand. This coincides with a prophecy made by her younger sister, Vivi. However, this fate cannot be avoided. If Jattawa and Four become lovers, she will lose her beloved sister. Can Jattawa cheat fate to save both her sister and her lover?
